channel.title: Multiplayer Problems
channel.description:
Content Downloading:
1. When connecting to a server hosting custom content no indication is made that the content is downloading. 2. Multiplayer custom content is placed into the single player campaign directory instead of a download folder, making it harder to purge.
Missing Features:
1. Decals don't appear to be supported at all as impulse 201 does nothing, but import is still possible 2. Voice chat doesn't seem to be supported at all in this release.

item.title: Multiplayer Problems
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Content Downloading:

  1. When connecting to a server hosting custom content no indication is made that the content is downloading.
  2. Multiplayer custom content is placed into the single player campaign directory instead of a download folder, making it harder to purge.

Missing Features:

  1. Decals don’t appear to be supported at all as impulse 201 does nothing, but import is still possible
  2. Voice chat doesn’t seem to be supported at all in this release.

Read full topic
